item.title: Using querydb in db-utils
item.description: The purpose of “querydb” is to easily execute an SQL SELECT statement at the command line or in a script. As with “modifydb”, in order to be generic, you may need to update the source to include the appropriate driver.

item.title: Using modifydb in db-utils
item.description: The purpose of “modifydb” is to easily execute an SQL statement that updates a database. In order to be generic, you may need to update the source to include the appropriate driver.
